languages.text: "А ты с юморком. Выведать секреты Инквизиции за самокрутку с лхо — это был бы номер. Но — нет".
"You're a funny one. The Inquisition's secrets for a tube of lho — that would be something, wouldn't it? No deal."
languages.original_text: "А ты с юморком. Выведать секреты Инквизиции за самокрутку с лхо — это был бы номер. Но — нет".

traits.locale_text: "You're a funny one. Buying the Inquisition secrets for a lho cigarette — that would be something, wouldn't it? But no.
"You're a funny one. Buying the Inquisition secrets for a lho cigarette — that would be something, wouldn't it? But no.
"You're a funny one. Buying the Inquisition secrets for a lho cigarette—that would be something, wouldn't it? But no way."
"You're a funny one. Buying the Inquisition secrets for a lho cigarette—that would be something, wouldn't it? But no way."
"You're a funny one. The Inquisition's secrets for a lho cigarette — that would be something, wouldn't it? No deal."
"You're a funny one. The Inquisition's secrets for a tube of lho — that would be something, wouldn't it? No deal."
"You're a funny one. The Inquisition's secrets for a tube of lho — that would be something, wouldn't it? No deal."

languages.text: « Vous êtes {mf|marrant|marrante}, vous. Ce serait quelque chose si on pouvait acheter les secrets de l'Inquisition avec un tube de lho, hein ? Mais non, n'y comptez pas. »
languages.original_text: "You're a funny one. The Inquisition's secrets for a tube of lho — that would be something, wouldn't it? No deal."

traits.locale_text: « Vous êtes {mf|marrant|marrante}, vous. Ce serait quelque chose si on pouvait acheter les secrets de l'Inquisition avec un tube de lho, hein ? Mais non, n'y comptez pas. »

languages.text: «Mira que es usted {mf|gracioso|graciosa}. Los secretos de la Inquisición por un poco de lho, menuda oferta, ¿verdad? Ni hablar».
languages.original_text: "You're a funny one. The Inquisition's secrets for a tube of lho — that would be something, wouldn't it? No deal."

traits.locale_text: «Mira que es usted {mf|gracioso|graciosa}. Los secretos de la Inquisición por un poco de lho, menuda oferta, ¿verdad? Ni hablar».

languages.text: “你这个人真有意思，打算用一根麻烟套出审判庭的秘密。要是真成了，那可就太厉害了，是吧？但这可不行。”
languages.original_text: "You're a funny one. The Inquisition's secrets for a tube of lho — that would be something, wouldn't it? No deal."

traits.locale_text: “你这个人真有意思，打算用一根麻烟套出审判庭的秘密。要是真成了，那可就太厉害了，是吧？但这可不行。”
“你这个人真有意思，打算用一根麻烟套出审判庭的秘密。要是真成了，那可就太厉害了，是吧？但这可不行。”

languages.text: 「あんた、面白いね。エルホのチューブで異端審問庁の秘密を買い取ろうなんてさ。なかなか大物になりそうじゃないか？だが、断るよ」
languages.original_text: "You're a funny one. The Inquisition's secrets for a tube of lho — that would be something, wouldn't it? No deal."

traits.locale_text: 「あんた、面白いね。エルホのチューブで異端審問庁の秘密を買い取ろうなんてさ。なかなか大物になりそうじゃないか？だが、断るよ」

languages.text: "Ihr seid ja zum Schießen. Die Geheimnisse der Inquisition für einen Lho-Stab ... das wäre mal was, oder? Vergesst es."
languages.original_text: "You're a funny one. The Inquisition's secrets for a tube of lho — that would be something, wouldn't it? No deal."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr seid ja zum Schießen. Die Geheimnisse der Inquisition für einen Lho-Stab ... das wäre mal was, oder? Vergesst es."
"Ihr seid ja zum Schießen. Die Geheimnisse der Inquisition für eine Lho-Zigarette ... das wäre mal was, oder? Vergesst es."

languages.text: "Komiksin. Bir dal liho karşılığında Engizisyon sırları... Ne güzel olurdu, değil mi? Yok ya."
languages.original_text: "You're a funny one. The Inquisition's secrets for a tube of lho — that would be something, wouldn't it? No deal."
